Measurement of blood pressure 
• Measure BP with the patient preferably in a relaxed sitting position with both feet flat on the ground, keeping the
arm at the level of the heart.
• Meas ure  BP in each arm and use the arm in which the BP is higher for all future measurements.
• Measure the BP with a device validated for use in pregnancy.
o Use the correct cuff size (length of 1.5 times the circumference of the arm)
